name: Wizard's Wing: Guardian of the Spellbound Runes
name_original: Wizard's Wing: Guardian of the Spellbound Runes
description:
Wizard's Wing: Guardian of the Spellbound Runes is a game where you control a magical phoenix that fires fireballs and a firebeam. The goal is to beat enemies trying to attack the runestone you are the guardian of. 

Controls:

Land: 
WASD Movement
Space to Jump
Jump again to fly

Air:
W go down
S go up
A turn left
D turn right
Q roll left
E roll right

Mouse:

Left Mbtn. Shoot fireball
Right Mbtn. Shoot firebeam

PLAY THE LEARN TO FLY TUTORIAL FIRST 

UNZIP -> Run the .exe
